database.name: VIEW EHCM_EMPGRP_VALUE_V
database.view: SELECT org.ad_org_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, org.value, (org.value || '-') || org.name AS name, org.ad_client_id, org.ad_org_id, org.isactive, org.created, org.createdby, org.updated, org.updatedby, 'ORG' AS item_value FROM ad_org org UNION SELECT reg.ehcm_region_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, reg.value, (reg.value || '-') || reg.regionname AS name, reg.ad_client_id, reg.ad_org_id, reg.isactive, reg.created, reg.createdby, reg.updated, reg.updatedby, 'REG' AS item_value FROM ehcm_region reg UNION SELECT gc.ehcm_gradeclass_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, gc.value, (gc.value || '-') || gc.name AS name, gc.ad_client_id, gc.ad_org_id, gc.isactive, gc.created, gc.createdby, gc.updated, gc.updatedby, 'GC' AS item_value FROM ehcm_gradeclass gc UNION SELECT gd.ehcm_grade_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, gd.value, (gd.value || '-') || gd.name AS name, gd.ad_client_id, gd.ad_org_id, gd.isactive, gd.created, gd.createdby, gd.updated, gd.updatedby, 'GD' AS item_value FROM ehcm_grade gd UNION SELECT jt.ehcm_jobs_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, jt.value, (jt.value || '-') || jt.job_title AS name, jt.ad_client_id, jt.ad_org_id, jt.isactive, jt.created, jt.createdby, jt.updated, jt.updatedby, 'JT' AS item_value FROM ehcm_jobs jt UNION SELECT lo.escm_location_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, '' AS value, (((((((((COALESCE(loc.address1, '') || ' - ') || COALESCE(loc.address2, '')) || ' - ') || COALESCE(loc.postal, '')) || ' - ') || COALESCE(city.name, '')) || ' - ') || COALESCE(reg.name, '')) || ' - ') || COALESCE(con.name, '') AS name, loc.ad_client_id, loc.ad_org_id, loc.isactive, loc.created, loc.createdby, loc.updated, loc.updatedby, 'LOC' AS item_value FROM c_location loc JOIN escm_location lo ON lo.c_location_id = loc.c_location_id LEFT JOIN c_region reg ON lo.c_region_id = reg.c_region_id LEFT JOIN c_city city ON loc.c_city_id = city.c_city_id LEFT JOIN c_country con ON reg.c_country_id = con.c_country_id UNION SELECT emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, emp.value, (emp.value || '-') || emp.arabicfullname AS name, emp.ad_client_id, emp.ad_org_id, emp.isactive, emp.created, emp.createdby, emp.updated, emp.updatedby, 'EMP' AS item_value FROM ehcm_emp_perinfo emp UNION SELECT reflist.ad_ref_list_id AS ehcm_empgrp_value_v_id, reflist.value, reflist.name, reflist.ad_client_id, reflist.ad_org_id, reflist.isactive, reflist.created, reflist.createdby, reflist.updated, reflist.updatedby, 'ER' AS item_value FROM ad_ref_list reflist WHERE reflist.ad_reference_id = '57889F5818294AE6B371B3FD3369E8B3'
